steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Click on the location in the document where you want to insert the math equation.
Go to the 'Insert' tab in the Word ribbon.
Click on the 'Equation' button in the 'Symbols' group.
Choose the type of math equation you want to insert, such as 'Linear', 'Quadratic', or 'Fraction'.
Enter the equation in the equation editor.
Click outside the equation editor to finalize the insertion of the math equation.
